TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignSurfaceManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignSurfaceManager Implements IDisposable, IServiceProvider
public ref class DesignSurfaceManager : IDisposable, IServiceProvider
type DesignSurfaceManager = class interface IServiceProvider interface IDisposable

span.span: Manages a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別設計為容器物件。The class is designed to be a container of objects. 它提供通用服務該控制代碼設計工具、 屬性 視窗中，與其他全域物件之間的事件路由。It provides common services that handle event routing between designers, property windows, and other global objects. 使用是選擇性的但仍建議如果您想要擁有數個設計工具視窗。Using is optional, but it is recommended if you intend to have several designer windows. 類別會自動提供數個設計階段服務。The class provides several design-time services automatically. 您可以覆寫的每個這些服務並取代在受保護屬性。You can override each of these services by replacing them in the protected property. 若要取代的服務，覆寫建構函式、 呼叫基底，並進行任何變更透過受保護屬性。To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected property. 所有的服務新增至服務容器可實作處置設計介面管理員時，會處置介面。All services added to the service container that implement the interface are disposed when the design surface manager is disposed. 類別提供為預設服務的介面。The class provides the interface as the default service. 提供通用的事件處理機制，設計工具的事件。 provides a global eventing mechanism for designer events. 使用這種機制，設計工具變成作用中時通知應用程式。With this mechanism, an application is informed when a designer becomes active. 此服務會提供設計工具的集合和全域物件，例如 [屬性] 視窗中，可以監視選取的其中一個位置變更事件。The service provides a collection of designers and a single place where global objects, such as the Properties window, can monitor selection change events.

permission.span: 取得的完整存取系統資源。

span.span: for full access to system resources.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property ActiveDesignSurface As DesignSurface

public: virtual property System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ ActiveDesignSurface { System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ get(); void set(System::ComponentModel::Design::DesignSurface ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定使用中的設計工具。

span.span: Gets or sets the active designer.
The active designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具會變成使用中視窗時，應藉由設計工具的使用者介面設定屬性。The property should be set by the designer's user interface whenever a designer becomes the active window. 這個屬性的預設實作會使用的預設實作通知有興趣的合作對象的新設計工具現在已使用的介面。The default implementation of this property works with the default implementation of the interface to notify interested parties that a new designer is now active. 如果您提供您自己實作，您應該覆寫此屬性，以適當地通知您的服務。If you provide your own implementation of , you should override this property to notify your service appropriately. 這個屬性可以設定為`null`，指出沒有設計工具為作用中。This property can be set to `null`, indicating that no designer is active.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface CreateDesignSurface(class System.IServiceProvider parentProvider) cil managed
Public Function CreateDesignSurface (parentProvider As IServiceProvider) As DesignSurface

param.name: parentProvider

span.span: A parent service provider.

param.span: 將會建立新的合併服務提供者，它會首先尋求這個提供者的服務，然後將任何失敗委派給設計介面管理員物件。

span.span: A new merged service provider will be created that will first ask this provider for a service, and then delegate any failures to the design surface manager object.

param.span: 這個合併提供者會傳入至 方法。

span.span: This merged provider will be passed into the method.

summary.span: 建立設計介面的執行個體。

span.span: Creates an instance of a design surface.

returns.span: 新的設計介面執行個體。

span.span: A new design surface instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要輕鬆地新增額外的每個設計工具服務，使用`parentProvider`參數來提供服務提供者，此設計介面。If you want to conveniently add additional per-designer services, use the `parentProvider` parameter to provide a service provider for this design surface. 方法會建立合併的服務提供者，可滿足這兩個指定的服務提供者的服務要求以及本身。The method creates a merged service provider that can satisfy service requests from both the given service provider as well as the itself. 方法則會傳遞到此服務提供者方法。The method then passes this service provider into the method. 在後設計介面中，會傳回方法會嘗試取得。After returns the design surface, the method tries to obtain the . 如果有的話，以及它是否正在服務的執行個體，根據預設，提供方法會引發事件。If it is present, and if it is the instance of the service that provided by default, the method raises the event.

span.span: is .

para.span: 如果提供外部服務的實作，則衍生自類別的責任類別來引發事件。

span.span: If an external implementation of the service was provided, it is the responsibility of the class that derives from the class to raise the event.

Implementation that creates the design surface.

span.span: A new design surface instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫由方法。The method is called by both methods. 它是實際上會建立在設計介面的實作。It is the implementation that actually creates the design surface. 預設實作只會傳回新。The default implementation just returns a new . 您可能會覆寫此方法以提供自訂的物件衍生自類別。You may override this method to provide a custom object that derives from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是直接在頂端實作，因此如果您提供您自己的實作，該服務時，這個屬性會使用您的實作。The property is implemented directly on top of , so if you provide your own implementation of that service, this property uses your implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公用方法會遵循標準模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 呼叫這個方法會終結設計介面管理員。Calling this method destroys the design surface manager. 它也會處置服務容器，這會導致所有的服務，可實作也要處置。It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement to also be disposed. 這個方法的受保護的版本是`virtual`，並遵循一般模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因為沒有任何原生程式碼以清除，它並沒有完成項呼叫。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果您需要呼叫，您必須自行加入完成項。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公用方法會遵循標準模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 呼叫這個方法會終結設計介面管理員。Calling this method destroys the design surface manager. 它也會處置服務容器，這會導致所有的服務，可實作也要處置。It also disposes the service container, which causes all services that implement to also be disposed. 這個方法的受保護的版本是`virtual`，並遵循一般模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因為沒有任何原生程式碼以清除，它並沒有完成項呼叫。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果您需要呼叫，您必須自行加入完成項。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`具有`disposing`設定為`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true 時，這個方法由任何 managed 物件持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 當覆寫小心不要參考先前處置好的呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱 <<c2> [ 實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需詳細資訊和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

span.span: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, the given service type; otherwise, if the service does not exist in the service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法轉送給送至設計介面管理員在建構階段的任何服務提供者。The method forwards to any service provider that was given to the design surface manager at construction time.
